name: The Jack Ryan Collection
overview: John Patrick "Jack" Ryan, Sr. is a fictional character created by Tom Clancy who appears in many of his novels and their respective film adaptations.

parts.overview: A new technologically-superior Soviet nuclear sub, the Red October, is heading for the U.S. coast under the command of Captain Marko Ramius. The American government thinks Ramius is planning to attack. Lone CIA analyst Jack Ryan has a different idea: he thinks Ramius is planning to defect, but he has only a few hours to find him and prove it - because the entire Russian naval and air commands are trying to find Ramius, too. The hunt is on!
parts.title: The Hunt for Red October

parts.overview: When CIA Analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets Jack and his family as revenge.
parts.title: Patriot Games

parts.overview: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.
parts.title: Clear and Present Danger
